Package org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2

Implementation of the Suffix Tree data structure.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
INodeFactory<T extends Node> Internal nodes factory for SuffixTree.
ISequence Provides all information for constructing a SuffixTree.
 

Class Summary
BitSetNode A Node with an associated BitSet.
BitSetNodeFactory INodeFactory returning CounterNodes.
CharacterSequence A ISequence wrapping arbitrary CharSequence.
CounterNode A Node with an associated counter.
CounterNodeFactory INodeFactory returning CounterNodes.
DefaultNodeFactory Default INodeFactory returning Nodes.
DepthFirstNodeIterator<T extends Node> Depth-first node iterator with postorder traversal (parent nodes after children nodes).
Edge An edge between two Nodes in a SuffixTree.
GeneralizedSuffixTree<T extends BitSetNode> Implementation of a generalized suffix tree (a suffix tree that holds more than one sequence and remembers documents from which each suffix in the tree comes from).
IntSequence A ISequence wrapping arbitrary array of integers.
Node A node in a SuffixTree.
SequenceFormatter Converts a ISequence to a String using SequenceFormatter.
SuffixTree<T extends Node> This class implements Esko Ukkonnen's algorithm for creating a suffix tree.
SuffixTreeFormatter Utilities for converting SuffixTrees to textual formats.
 

Package org.carrot2.text.suffixtrees2 Description

Implementation of the Suffix Tree data structure.
